comments:
I was in the editor for an XPlanner task. Near the "Description" field, there is a small blue arrow button (reply button). When I pressed it, the error log entry below appeared.

Created an attachment (id=75463)
Contains blocking of creation of reply-to links for XPlanner

XPlanner connector doesn't currently support comments, so the attached patch will block creation of "reply-to" hyperlinks, which allow creation of new comments in reply to an existing one.  When the XPlanner connector will support comments ("notes" in XPlanner terms), I can remove the blocking.

Thanks
-Helen
